title: @Riot if you want free money here is a hint
body:
Please for the love of god let us have a bundle for chests only WITHOUT keys, or I'm never going to fucking ever find a way to use these things.
https://imgur.com/OeIkNm7

an even better solution would be to lets us swap a complete key for a chest but i know you would never do that.. so i stopped trying...

replies.body: I like how the thumbnail for the pic doesn't even show the keys...
Yeah, I thought you were typically complaining about the lack of Orange Essence, til I almost dropped from my chair from looking it as 300 til it appeared as 3300.
Although, increasing orange essence drops would probably get more people buying chests.

I don't understand how people can have that many keys without chests, i mean, how long do you guys sit on full stacked chests without farming them?
I am the opposite case, like 30+ chests and 0 keys, anybody wanna trade?
Because I play ARAM normally and getting Ss there is totally randomized and I don't play many champions.
You play ARAM... but don't play many champions...?  How?

As in:
1) I play ARAM where getting S grade is pretty much random as it depends on teamcomps which are random (just recently I had averagely decent game as Fiora because my teamcomp and enemy teamcomp allowed me to have such game, all random, funny thing is while nearly all my teammates got S I got B+, heh)
2) When I don't play ARAM, I play Ranked and don't play many champions there
Ohhhhh ok, thanks for explaining.

One trick players
Doesn't every single climbing guide recommend picking roughly 2-5 champions and sticking to only them?

I think for people with smaller champion pools like myself, we get our chests early on in the season. Like, I only play a handful of champions, so getting an S-Rank with unfamiliar champs, even in off-meta positions, is a tall order.

just onetrick

im currently sitting on 30+ keys and i dont want to play anything else thats not lulu
When you rarely get S and your just a healthy non toxic player who obtains keys
Same.

It's cuz many people just sit on stacked chests as they lack the skill or the will to play a variety of champions to a greater than average skill value. I for example have 4 chests overdue. And i should have 4 more if i didn't go on vacation a while ago. No keys at all.
My friend has 46 chests. He literally plays a different champion every time we play.
Yeah I'm in that boat too.

"Try playing different champs"

1. Not everyone that plays this game plays with friends. I can't ride my friend's S ranks for chests while playing champions I'm shit at.
2. You don't just magically pull S ranks out of your ass when you're in Diamond. I play a few select champions because I'm very good at them. I can't turn around and play at the same level with everything without spending weeks learning them.
3. This thread wasn't asking for free chests. It's asking to make it an option to buy them without them coming bundled with keys.
git gud
Am i the only one that has more chests than keys?

Lol.  Also currently at around 30+.

At least when I do get chests I can pop them open like candy.

Its actually not to hard to get an S on most champs to get the chests. Just play them in an off role dont feed and have a positive score and you'll get one!
Like if you took soraka top in a normal, didn't die and farmed enough, won and you'll get a S for the chest.

So I'd say to earn EVERY chest you'd probably have to be playing for about 2 1/2 years, and you'd have to by a miracle of chance be good at ALL the cheapest champs on your own skill.
